SKT_FIRST.name: Dragon Tusk
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. This attack deals increased damage proportional to the number of <color=#28d9ed>debuffs</color> on the target.\nHas a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Cursed</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. This effect ignores the target's Resilience.
description: Attacks an enemy. This attack deals increased damage proportional to the number of <color=#28d9ed>debuffs</color> on the target.\nHas a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000062_1_2]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Cursed</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000062_1_2] turn(s)</color>. This effect ignores the target's Resilience.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격합니다. 이 공격은 대상이 보유한 <color=#28d9ed>약화 효과</color>가 많을수록 피해가 증가합니다.\n대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 지속되는 <color=#28d9ed>저주</color>를 부여합니다. 이 효과는 대상의 효과 저항을 무시합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与える。このスキルは対象の<color=#28d9ed>弱体効果</color>の数が多いほど、与えるダメージがUPする。\n対象に<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>呪い</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。この効果は対象の効果抵抗を無視する。

SKT_SECOND.name: Burning Fist
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks an enemy.\nInflicts <color=#28d9ed>Cursed</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. This effect ignores the target's Resilience.\nRight after using this skill, does not trigger an enemy's Counterattack, Revenge, or Agile Response.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: +2 turns Reduced Critical Hit Chance duration

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changed to Enhanced Skill\nIncreased damage (Additional increased damage dealt to Dark element enemies)
SKT_BURST_3.effect_kr: 강화 스킬로 교체\n피해 증가 (암속성 적에게는 추가로 피해 증가)
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 強化スキルに変更\nダメージUP(闇属性の敵には\n追加でダメージUP)

description: Attacks an enemy.\nInflicts <color=#28d9ed>Cursed</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000062_2_1] turn(s)</color>. This effect ignores the target's Resilience.\nRight after using this skill, does not trigger an enemy's Counterattack, Revenge, or Agile Response.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격합니다.\n대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 지속되는 <color=#28d9ed>저주</color>를 부여합니다. 이 효과는 대상의 효과 저항을 무시합니다.\n이 스킬 직후에는 적의 반격, 복수, 신속 대응이 발동하지 않습니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与える。\n対象に<color=#28d9ed>呪い</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。この効果は対象の効果抵抗を無視する。\nこのスキルでは敵の反撃、復讐、迅速対応が発動しない。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Conquering Dragon Meteor Fist
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance to inflict reduced <color=#28d9ed>Critical Hit Chance</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. This effect ignores the target's Resilience.\nThis attack deals increased damage proportional to the number of <color=#28d9ed>buffs and debuffs</color> on the target.
description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000062_3_1]</color> chance to inflict reduced <color=#28d9ed>Critical Hit Chance</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000062_3_1] turn(s)</color>. This effect ignores the target's Resilience.\nThis attack deals increased damage proportional to the number of <color=#28d9ed>buffs and debuffs</color> on the target.
SKT_ULTIMATE.name_jp: 超覇王暴竜流星黒炎拳
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고, <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>치명 확률</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 감소시킵니다. 이 효과는 대상의 효과 저항을 무시합니다.\n이 공격은 대상이 보유한 <color=#28d9ed>약화 효과와 강화 효과</color>가 많을수록 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与える。<color=#28d9ed>80%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>会心率</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。この効果は対象の効果抵抗を無視する。\nこのスキルは対象の<color=#28d9ed>弱体効果と強化効果</color>の数が多いほど、与えるダメージがUPする。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: Attacks an enemy and grants increased <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage dealt increases proportional to the number of <color=#28d9ed>debuffs</color> on the target.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: Attacks an enemy and grants increased <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000055_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage dealt increases proportional to the number of <color=#28d9ed>debuffs</color> on the target.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 적을 공격하고 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 증가시킵니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 대상이 보유한 <color=#28d9ed>약화 효과</color>가 많을수록 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:敵にダメージを与え、自分の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>が<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPする。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:対象の<color=#28d9ed>弱体効果</color>の数が多いほど与えるダメージがUPする。
